text: @DPJHodges No. In the absence of impartial, balanced or sensible reporting on Covid-19 by @BBCNews, @itvnews, @Channel4News, @SkyNews et al, it is the only briefing worth watching. I do tend to switch off when journalists start their negative point scoring, though...
